title: Myskhako necropolis
description: A burial area on the Black Sea coast that is associated with the settlement of Myskhako. In 1978-1979 excavations were conducted that uncovered 81 burial sites dating to the Bronze Age, the Classical period, and the Middle Ages.

properties.description: Point representing the approximate location of the burial site excavated in 1979, after Malyshev 2020.
properties.title: Imagery location of Myskhako necropolis
